ingredients.ingredient: 2 (15 ounce) cans chickpeas, drained and rinsed
1 (1 ounce) package taco seasoning mix (such as Taco Bell®)

cookingTips: Mash some chickpeas while leaving others whole for varied texture
Simmer with seasoning and water to develop rich, savory flavors throughout
Warm taco shells in oven for 5 minutes before filling for optimal crispness
enrichment.coachingPrompt: Show me how to prepare seasoned chickpeas for delicious, quick vegetarian tacos.
